import {useState} from "react"; const FormAdd = () =>{ const [name, setName] =useState(""); const [move, setMove] =useState(""); const [skill, setSkill] =useState(""); const [anime, setAnime] =useState(""); return (

CREATE AN ANIME CHARACTER

{setName(e.target.value)}} value={name}>
{setMove(e.target.value)}} value={move}>
{setSkill(e.target.value)}} value={skill}>

DISPLAY VALUE

); } export default FormAdd;
